title: (x) Wine bottle font? / 'Penélope': script - probably custom, alternatives {Joe Francis}
content:
Can anyone identify this Penelope wine bottle font please? Much appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014223939im_/http:/typophile.com/files/46712f18097067f4267b5d0d1aa429bc72fae1ed_m_6458.jpg)
author: Pabs69

comments.content: Most likely to be hand. [some nice scripts here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014223939/http:/www.sudtipos.com/fonts)
